text: (muhminkale!) Ninkal evvalavutan virumpinalum, manaiviyaritaiye ninkal nitam celutta cattiyamakatu. Anal (ore manaiviyin pakkam) murrilum cayntu marravalai antarattil tonka vitappattaval ponru akkivitatirkal;. Ninkal (allahvukkup) payantu camatanamaka natantu kolvirkalanal, niccayamaka allah mikavum mannippavanakavum, mikka karunaiyutaiyavanakavum irukkinran
